name: Ticketack
author: Net Oxygen SÃ rl

sections.description:
Official Ticketack integration plugin.

More infos about Ticketack.

Main features:

  • Display upcoming movies and screenings
  • Many display layouts (list, grid, gallery…)
  • Full add to cart and checkout process

Integrations:

  • Get access to Kronos directly from
    the admin menu
  • Synchronize your Eventival guests.
  • Embed your Pantaflix VOD players.
  • All your images are cached and resized using Weserv
    service.

Please note that you must have been provided some configuration informations
from the Ticketack team to be able to use this plugin.

Privacy policies:

  • Ticketack
  • Kronos
  • Eventival
  • Pantaflix
  • Weserv

Development

Interested in development? Browse the
code and submit a Pull Request.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  2. Use the Settings->Ticketack screen to configure the plugin

description:
Official Ticketack integration plugin.

More infos about Ticketack.

Main features:

  • Display upcoming movies and screenings
  • Many display layouts (list, grid, gallery…)
  • Full add to cart and checkout process

Integrations:

  • Get access to Kronos directly from
    the admin menu
  • Synchronize your Eventival guests.
  • Embed your Pantaflix VOD players.
  • All your images are cached and resized using Weserv
    service.

Please note that you must have been provided some configuration informations
from the Ticketack team to be able to use this plugin.

Privacy policies:

  • Ticketack
  • Kronos
  • Eventival
  • Pantaflix
  • Weserv

Development

Interested in development? Browse the
code and submit a Pull Request.
